languages.text: "А ты! Ты, мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} послушн{mf|ый|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}!" {n}Маражай хватает вас за подбородок и впивается в вас взглядом в упор.{/n} "Чувствуешь ли ты этот жар? Это разрывающее изнутри пламя? Эту неутолимую жажду, на мгновение напоенную морем крови? Осознал{mf||а} ли ты то, чему я пытаюсь научить тебя?!"

"And you! You, my obedient little pet!" {n}Marazhai grabs you by the chin and stares deep into your eyes.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Do you understand now what I am trying to teach you?"
languages.original_text: "А ты! Ты, мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} послушн{mf|ый|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}!" {n}Маражай хватает вас за подбородок и впивается в вас взглядом в упор.{/n} "Чувствуешь ли ты этот жар? Это разрывающее изнутри пламя? Эту неутолимую жажду, на мгновение напоенную морем крови? Осознал{mf||а} ли ты то, чему я пытаюсь научить тебя?!"

traits.locale_text: "And you! You, my obedient little pet!" {n}Marazhai grabs you by the chin and stares deep into your eyes.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Do you understand now what I am trying to teach you?"

"And you! You, my obedient little pet!" {n}Marazhai grabs you by the chin and stares deep into your eyes.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Do you understand now what I am trying to teach you?"

"And you! You, my obedient little pet!" {n}Marazhai grabs you by the chin and stares deep into your eyes.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Do you understand now what I am trying to teach you?"

"And you! You, my obedient little pet!" {n}Marazhai grabs you by the chin and stares deep into your eyes.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Do you understand now what I am trying to teach you?"

languages.text: “还有你！我温顺的小宠物！”{n}玛拉斋抓住了你的下巴，深深地盯着你的双眼。{/n}“你有没有感觉到这股热浪？这股从内心深处撕裂你的火焰？你有没有感觉到这种无法满足的饥渴，只有在血海之中才能暂时平息？现在，你明白我试图教给你的东西了吗？”
languages.original_text: "And you! You, my obedient little pet!" {n}Marazhai grabs you by the chin and stares deep into your eyes.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Do you understand now what I am trying to teach you?"

traits.locale_text: “还有你！我温顺的小宠物！”{n}玛拉斋抓住了你的下巴，深深地盯着你的双眼。{/n}“你有没有感觉到这股热浪？这股从内心深处撕裂你的火焰？你有没有感觉到这种无法满足的饥渴，只有在血海之中才能暂时平息？现在，你明白我试图教给你的东西了吗？”

languages.text: 「お前もだ！なぁ、俺の従順な可愛いペットよ！」{n}マラズハイがあなたの顎を掴み、瞳を奥深くまでじっと見つめてくる。{/n}「この熱さを感じるか？内側から突き抜けるこの炎を？満たされない渇きが、血の海で一瞬だけ癒されたあの感覚を？俺が教えようとしてることがわかるか？」
languages.original_text: "And you! You, my obedient little pet!" {n}Marazhai grabs you by the chin and stares deep into your eyes.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Do you understand now what I am trying to teach you?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前もだ！なぁ、俺の従順な可愛いペットよ！」{n}マラズハイがあなたの顎を掴み、瞳を奥深くまでじっと見つめてくる。{/n}「この熱さを感じるか？内側から突き抜けるこの炎を？満たされない渇きが、血の海で一瞬だけ癒されたあの感覚を？俺が教えようとしてることがわかるか？」

languages.text: «¡Y tú! ¡Mi obediente mascotita!». {n}Marazhai te agarra por la barbilla y te mira fijamente a los ojos.{/n} «¿Sientes este calor? ¿Esta llama que te desgarra por dentro? ¿Esta sed incontenible, que solo se extingue momentáneamente bajo un mar de sangre? ¿Entiendes ahora lo que quiero enseñarte?».
languages.original_text: "And you! You, my obedient little pet!" {n}Marazhai grabs you by the chin and stares deep into your eyes.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Do you understand now what I am trying to teach you?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Y tú! ¡Mi obediente mascotita!». {n}Marazhai te agarra por la barbilla y te mira fijamente a los ojos.{/n} «¿Sientes este calor? ¿Esta llama que te desgarra por dentro? ¿Esta sed incontenible, que solo se extingue momentáneamente bajo un mar de sangre? ¿Entiendes ahora lo que quiero enseñarte?».

languages.text: « Et vous, {mf|mon brave petit|ma brave petite} esclave ! » {n}Marazhai vous saisit le menton et plante son regard dans le vôtre.{/n} « Sentez-vous cette chaleur torride ? Cette flamme qui vous ronge de l'intérieur ? Cette soif inextinguible brièvement assouvie par une déferlante de sang ? Comprenez-vous à présent ce que je cherche à vous enseigner ? »
languages.original_text: "And you! You, my obedient little pet!" {n}Marazhai grabs you by the chin and stares deep into your eyes.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Do you understand now what I am trying to teach you?"

traits.locale_text: « Et vous, {mf|mon brave petit|ma brave petite} esclave ! » {n}Marazhai vous saisit le menton et plante son regard dans le vôtre.{/n} « Sentez-vous cette chaleur torride ? Cette flamme qui vous ronge de l'intérieur ? Cette soif inextinguible brièvement assouvie par une déferlante de sang ? Comprenez-vous à présent ce que je cherche à vous enseigner ? »

languages.text: "Und Ihr! Ihr, {mf|mein gehorsamer Ergebener|meine gehorsame Ergebene}!" {n}Marazhai packt dich am Kinn und starrt tief in deine Augen.{/n} "Fühlt Ihr diese Hitze? Die Flamme, die Euch von innen heraus zerreißt? Der unstillbare Durst, der nur für einen Augenblick lang durch ein Meer von Blut gelöscht wird? Versteht Ihr nun, was ich Euch zeigen will?"
languages.original_text: "And you! You, my obedient little pet!" {n}Marazhai grabs you by the chin and stares deep into your eyes.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Do you understand now what I am trying to teach you?"

traits.locale_text: "Und Ihr! Ihr, {mf|mein gehorsamer Ergebener|meine gehorsame Ergebene}!" {n}Marazhai packt dich am Kinn und starrt tief in deine Augen.{/n} "Fühlt Ihr diese Hitze? Die Flamme, die Euch von innen heraus zerreißt? Der unstillbare Durst, der nur für einen Augenblick lang durch ein Meer von Blut gelöscht wird? Versteht Ihr nun, was ich Euch zeigen will?"

languages.text: "Hele sen!.. Benim itaatkâr minik hayvanım!" {n}Marazhai, seni çenenden kavrayarak gözlerinin içine derin derin bakıyor.{/n} "O hiddeti hissediyor musun? İçten içe seni parçalayan o alevi, yalnızca bir anlığına bir kan denizinin söndürebileceği o bastırılamayan susuzluğu hissediyor musun? Şimdi sana ne öğretmeye çalıştığımı anlıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "And you! You, my obedient little pet!" {n}Marazhai grabs you by the chin and stares deep into your eyes.{/n} "Do you feel this heat? This flame rending you from within? This unquenchable thirst, slaked for a moment by a sea of blood? Do you understand now what I am trying to teach you?"

traits.locale_text: "Hele sen!.. Benim itaatkâr minik hayvanım!" {n}Marazhai, seni çenenden kavrayarak gözlerinin içine derin derin bakıyor.{/n} "O hiddeti hissediyor musun? İçten içe seni parçalayan o alevi, yalnızca bir anlığına bir kan denizinin söndürebileceği o bastırılamayan susuzluğu hissediyor musun? Şimdi sana ne öğretmeye çalıştığımı anlıyor musun?"
